products.description: We love texture. It's a stunning addition to any room, and, quite frankly, can work better than pattern at injecting personality into a scheme. products.title: Nectar Honey Roman Blind

products.title: Pippin Honey Roman Blind
products.description: Theres a real feel of summer about the pippin honey roman blind, with a golden tone to its luxurious fabric that reminds us of wheat fields and hazy days. The subtle colour-way is not only gorgeous, it makes for effortless matching too thanks to its neutral overtones.

products.title: William Morris Sunflower Honey Roman Blind
products.description: A true william morris showstopper, the sunflower design is still as beautiful now as when it was first designed in 1879. Part of their collaboration with the v&a, the sunflower honey roman blind is a great choice if you want to replicate a warm summer's day in your home. Th a true william morris showstopper, the sunflower design is still as beautiful now as when it was first designed in 1879.
